title: The Media Fell Right Into the Trap (Ep 1181)
description:
In this episode, I address the bombshell Spygate article dropped by The NY Times and the subsequent head-fake interview given by Attorney General Barr. Don’t fall for the nonsense, Barr knew exactly what he was doing.  News Picks:Breaking: John Durham is investigating whether John Brennan’s CIA misled the FBI in the Russia probe. 

 

Attorney General Barr says he wishes Trump would stop tweeting about DOJ cases. 

 

A Democrat shows up at a Trump rally and is stunned at what she finds.

 

The rise of Bernie Sanders has the Democrats in a panic. 

 

More devastating information about the lead juror in the Roger Stone case. 

 

Hope Hicks returns to the White House. 

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
